title: Selected State
custom_preconds:
Given a user has an iPad
and has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is in Gameday 
and views the Out of Town Scoreboard (OOTSB)

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in any state
and the team is set as a Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and a star to the right of the team tricode

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game with an unknown time (3:33)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the time will be TBD

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game with a known time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the user will see records (W#-L#)
and the time will be in the correct time zone

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game with a known time
and the day is +2 from the current day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the user will not see records
and the time will be in the correct time zone of the device

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a delayed start
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the user will see records (W#-L#)
and the time will be in the correct time zone
and the text '- Del' after the time will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in delayed start ceremony
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the user will see records (W#-L#)
and the time will be in the correct time zone
and the text '- Cer' after the time will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game that is second game of a doubleheader

If start time is 3:33 am and the game _id is 2
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the user will see records (W#-L#)
and the time will displayed as Game 2

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will not be displayed
and the Warmup status will be displayed
and empty bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Top inning
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top <inning number> will be displayed
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Mid inning
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Mid <inning number> will be displayed
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Bottom inning
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in End inning
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the End <inning number> will be displayed
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in live state
and runner on first base
and one out
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and right most base will be filled in with yellow
and left out indicator (circles) will be filled in with grey

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in live state
and runner on first, second, third (bases loaded)
and two outs
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and three bases will be filled in with yellow (except for bottom base - home plate)
and two out indicators (circles) will be filled in with grey

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a Umpire Review
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- Ump Rev' will be displayed after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a Team Challenge
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- <team tricode> Chal' will be displayed after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a delay
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- Del' will be displayed after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a delay ceremony
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- Cer' will be displayed after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in a Suspended state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- SUSP' will be displayed after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a resume date of a suspended game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the resume time will be displayed
and the text '- SUSP' will be displayed after the time
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the text Final will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in final
and the game completed early
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the text Final will displayed
and the text '/<inning #>' will be displayed after Final

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in final
and the game completed in extra innings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the text Final will displayed
and the text '/<inning #>' will be displayed after Final

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Postponed state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will not be displayed
and the text Postponed will displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Cancelled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will not be displayed
and the text Canceled will displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps on a game in Forfeit state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will not be displayed
and the text Forfeit will displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a live game
and game is No Hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- No-hitter' will be displayed in red after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a live game
and game is Perfect Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the Top/Bot <inning number> will be displayed
and the text '- Perfect game' will be displayed in red after the inning number
and bases and out indicator will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in final
and game is No Hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the text Final will be displayed
and text and the text '- No-hitter' in red will be displayed in red after Final

custom_steps_separated.content:
and taps on a game in final
and game is Perfect Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see away team tricode over home team tricode
and the score will be displayed
and the text Final will be displayed
and text and the text '- Perfect game' in red will be displayed in red after Final

title: iPad Header
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing a game in Gameday
and views the header (above the OOTSB)

custom_steps_separated.content: for a game in Preview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a back button on the left margin
and the MLB.TV and Gameday Audio button on the right margin
and the game information centered (Away Team @ Home Team)
and the date information below (April 7, 2017)

custom_steps_separated.content: for a game in Progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a back button on the left margin
and the MLB.TV and Gameday Audio button on the right margin
and the game information centered (Away Team <Score> @ Home Team <Score>)
and the date information below (April 7, 2017)

custom_steps_separated.content: for a game in Final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a back button on the left margin
and the MLB.TV and Gameday Audio button on the right margin
and the game information centered (Away Team <Score> @ Home Team <Score>)
and the date information below (April 7, 2017)

title: Gameday -> Top Nav Bar-Audio Button Added
custom_preconds: * User has latest build downloaded
custom_steps: GIVEN a user launches gameday
custom_expected:
WHEN the webview stack is pushed
THEN a nav bar should appear
And a Back button will be displayed on the left
And a Gameday label
AND an Audio button may be displayed (right most)

title: Gameday -> Webview-> Game in Preview State
custom_preconds: * User has latest build downloaded
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user launches gameday
And Game is in Preview State 
When gameday opens in webview
custom_expected:
Then the use should see an option to buy tickets
And the user should see an option as to where to follow the game
And the probable pitchers are displayed
And Matchups are displayed

title: Gameday -> Webview-> Game in Final State
custom_preconds: * User has latest build downloaded
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user launches gameday
And Game is in Final State
When gameday opens in webview
custom_expected:
Then the User should see the final score between the two teams 
And the user should see a CTA button on the right hand side of the final score which will bring the user to gameday wrap
And the user should see the box score
And the user should see the game story CTA, and to the right a video highlight of the game
And below that, the user should see the following CTA's: "Wrap" "Box" "Summary" "Videos" and Story

title: Gameday -> SSO for Gameday 5
custom_preconds: * User is logged into App
custom_steps:
Given the user launches Gameday 5 webview from within the app
WHen the user taps to launch Gameday 3D
custom_expected: Then their login information will passed through to view Gameday 3D

title: Targeting of User Entitlements for Gameday 3D
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is entitled for MLB.TV or At Bat

WHEN the user launches Gameday within the app

THEN the user’s entitlement info will be passed through to Gameday

subsequently, 

GIVEN a user is entitled for MLB.TV or At Bat

WHEN the user launches Gameday within the app

and taps the Gameday 3D button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to seamlessly launch Gameday 3D, without being prompted with a paywall or to log in.

title: Enable hooks to allow Gameday webview to call app login
custom_preconds: * Ensure user is not logged in
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is not logged in

and launches the Gameday webview in the app

and 3D is supported for a particular game

WHEN the user taps the 3D button, either from the top nav or from within the Gameday webview
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted with the native app login

title: Team Order
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a game in preview
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the away team, logo, record displayed on the left
and the @ character
and the home team, logo, record displayed on the right

title: Start Time Unknown (TBD)
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing a game preview
and the start time is not known (time="3:33")
custom_expected: Then the user will see TBD

title: Start Time Known
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the game preview
and the start time is known
custom_expected: Then the user will see the start time in the correct time zone of the device

title: Game 2 of Back to Back Doubleheader
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing the Game Preview
and the game is Game of a back to back doubleheader

If start time is 3:33 am and the game _id is _2
custom_expected: Then the user will see Game 2 instead of start time

title: Delayed Start
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a Game Preview
and the game is in delayed start state
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a grey banner under logos/broadcasters logos
and the text displayed is 'Delayed - <Reason Code>'

title: Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a Game Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: and no probables pitchers are set for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats displayed for both teams
and on iPad will display default MLB.com image
and on iPhone will display default player headshot

custom_steps_separated.content: and a probable pitcher is set for the away team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats for home team (right)
and the user will see the probable pitcher for the away team (left)

custom_steps_separated.content: and a probable pitcher is set for the home team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see TBD and no stats for away team (left)
and the user will see the probable pitcher for the home team (right)

custom_steps_separated.content: and probable pitchers are set for both teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see probable pitcher for both teams 
and handness (LHP, RHP) and number will be displayed
and the current stats (W-L, ERA) and headshot will be displayed on iPhone
and current stats (W-L, ERA, K) and editorial report and action shot will be displayed on iPad

title: Player Card
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a Game Preview
and the probables pitchers are displayed
and the lineups are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and a user taps on a probable pitcher headshot on iPhone
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the player card will open
and be displayed as an arrow
and the user is able to swipe back

custom_steps_separated.content: and a user taps on a player in the lineup on iPhone
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the player card will open
and be displayed as an arrow
and the user is able to swipe back

custom_steps_separated.content: and a user taps on a player in the lineup on iPad
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the player card will open
and be displayed as a popover
and tapping away will dismiss the player card

title: Lineups
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a Game Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: and no lineups are set for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a LINEUPS header
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' displayed once on iPhone
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' displayed under each team column

custom_steps_separated.content: and a lineup is set for the away team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see the lineup for the away team (left)
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' text for the home team (right)

custom_steps_separated.content: and a lineup is set for the home team only
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see the lineup for the home team (right)
and 'LINEUPS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE' text for the away team (left)

custom_steps_separated.content: and lineups are for both teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see LINEUPS header
and the text (Subject to Change) 
and the lineups for both teams 
and team logo will be displayed as a watermark and centered behind the team's lineup

custom_steps_separated.content:
and the user is viewing the lineup column
and the ballpark is an AL park (or a game with a DH)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Team Name
and a Player and Position header
and then 10 rows of data
and see Batting Order, Player Name, Batting Side (L or R or S), Position
and a dash for the starting pitching in the 10th row (name and position only)

custom_steps_separated.content:
and the user is viewing the lineup column
and the ballpark is an NL park (or a game without a DH)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Team Name
and a Player and Position header
and then 9 rows of data
and see Batting Order, Player Name, Batting Side (L or R or S), Position

title: Game Preview
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on an iPhone
and views a Game Preview
and the game has an editorial game preview published
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the editorial content in-between the game links and lineups
and the user will see preview image related to the game or probable pitcher
and a headline text under the bottom of the image
and a preview blurb with a More button
and tapping the image or blurb or More will open the Preview Article

title: Game Preview - Swipe
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a Game in Preview 
and pre game content has been added (Probables, Lineups, Preview)
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to swipe the Game Preview
and all the content is visible

title: TV and Radio Broadcaster
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When the user is viewing a Game Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: and no TV and no Radio broadcasters in the Scoreboard file
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will not see TBD for the TV or Radio 
and proper spacing other other elements

custom_steps_separated.content: and TV or Radio broadcasters in the Scoreboard file
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the available TV data
and only see the available Radio data

title: Game Links
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
